definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: She opened her never-before-used set of watercolours and set to work.
sentences.chinese: 她打开自己从未用过的水彩画工具，开始认真画画。

sentences.english: Most of the images are taken with micro techniques and lens to be able to shot these great shots.
sentences.chinese: 大多数技术和镜头都能够拍摄这些精彩画面。

sentences.english: It is a typical imperial-court decorative painting of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 该画为典型的宋代院体画，是工笔重彩画中的佳作。

sentences.english: Painting with watercolors is quite different from painting with oils, for example.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，水彩画和油画有很大不同。

sentences.english: A dry brush technique in watercolor painting uses very little water.
sentences.chinese: 阿干在水彩画技法使用非常少的水。

sentences.english: Is it a picture of watercolour?
Tempera was used to paint frescos hundreds of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 数世纪前蛋彩画颜料被用来画壁画。

sentences.english: It was to be a whole-length in water-colours, like mr.
sentences.chinese: 应该是全身水彩画像，就像奈特里先生的那幅一样。

sentences.english: Meticulous heavy color painting will emerge in the painting later gradually moves toward the decline.
sentences.chinese: 工笔重彩画在文人画兴起以后逐步走向衰落。

sentences.english: This DVD is an ideal introduction into the basics of watercolour painting.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个DVD到理想水彩画的基础知识介绍。

sentences.english: Learn how to paint more background trees in a snowscape watercolor painting in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何在雪景画水彩画在此免费视频更多的背景树。

sentences.english: Please put the mouse on the photo to see the original painting.
sentences.chinese: 请把滑鼠放在图片上观看水彩画原作品。

sentences.english: Learn about splatter painting from a professional artist in this free watercolor painting video.
sentences.chinese: 了解有关飞溅从专业画家画水彩画在此免费视频。

sentences.english: Guilin, the small city is unique and like a water color painting, especially a Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 桂林小城奇特，像一幅水彩画，尤其像中国油画。

sentences.english: These pulsating oil paintings made it abundantly clear that Turner wasn't just a water colorist.
sentences.chinese: 这些油画充分证明透纳不仅仅是一个水彩画家。

definition: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
